channel.title: node.js on Nick Desaulniers
channel.description: Recent content in node.js on Nick Desaulniers

item.title: Making Great Node.js Modules With Coffeescript
item.description: Node.js is a great runtime for writing applications in JavaScript, the language I primarily develop in. CoffeeScript is a programming language that compiles to JavaScript. Why would we write a reusable piece of code, a module , in CoffeeScript? CoffeeScript is a very high level language and beautifully brings together my favorite aspects of JavaScript, Ruby, and Python. In this tutorial, I’ll show you how I create reusable open source modules for Node.
